replies.bodyText: this is converting this json object to a profile than getting a profile as part of this json object
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: But if it's getProfile(JsonObject) it's clear it's getting it from JSON too.
replies.author: Runemoro
liach

timeline.author: Runemoro
timeline.diffHunk:
